overview: In this chilling adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, withdrawn and sensitive teen Carrie White faces taunting from classmates at school and abuse from her fanatically pious mother at home. When strange occurrences start happening around Carrie, she begins to suspect that she has supernatural powers. Invited to the prom by the empathetic Tommy Ross, Carrie tries to let her guard down, but things eventually take a dark and violent turn.
tagline: If you've got a taste for terror… take Carrie to the prom!
cast: Sissy Spacek|Piper Laurie|Amy Irving|William Katt|John Travolta
